languages.text: "Я не хочу бросать тебя в одиночестве — ты бы этого не оценил{mf||а}, верно?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"
languages.original_text: "Я не хочу бросать тебя в одиночестве — ты бы этого не оценил{mf||а}, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, right?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, right?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"
"I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

languages.text: “我可不想把你一个人丢在这里。你是不会感激我的，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: “我可不想把你一个人丢在这里。你是不会感激我的，是吧？”

languages.text: «No quiero marcharme todavía. No te gustaría que me fuera, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: «No quiero marcharme todavía. No te gustaría que me fuera, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「ここに置いていくのは忍びない…それは、お前も嫌だろう？」
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ここに置いていくのは忍びない――それはお前も嫌だろう？」

languages.text: "Ich will Euch nicht alleine lassen – das würde Euch missfallen, oder?"
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich will Euch nicht alleine lassen – das würde Euch missfallen, richtig?"

languages.text: « Je ne veux pas vous laisser {mf|seul|seule}... Ça ne vous plairait pas, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne veux pas vous laisser {mf|seul|seule}... Ça ne vous plairait pas, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Seni bırakmak istemiyorum. Bunu sen de istemezsin, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I don't want to leave you all alone — you wouldn't appreciate that, would you?"

traits.locale_text: "Seni bırakmak istemiyorum. Bunu sen de istemezsin, değil mi?"
